unnormalised: Breaking News: Controversy erupts as local corporator, Mr. Rajesh Sharma, faces allegations of misusing his authority. Sources say that despite being addressed as "Shri" Sharma by many, his actions don't quite reflect the honor that title implies. The incident involves a land dispute near Powai Lake, Mumbai.
normalised: Breaking News: Controversy erupts as local corporator, Mister Rajesh Sharma, faces allegations of misusing his authority. Sources say that despite being addressed as "Shri" Sharma by many, his actions don't quite reflect the honor that title implies. The incident involves a land dispute near Powai Lake, Mumbai.

unnormalised: Apparently, the residents addressed as "Bhai" by their peers, have been protesting for weeks. The local "Didi", Mrs. Sunita Patil, a well-respected social worker, also joined the protest, adding pressure on the authorities.
normalised: Apparently, the residents addressed as "Bhai" by their peers, have been protesting for weeks. The local "Didi", Mistress Sunita Patil, a well-respected social worker, also joined the protest, adding pressure on the authorities.

unnormalised: According to reports, the conflict revolves around the construction of a commercial complex which threatens the livelihoods of several local vendors, addressed as "Anna" by those in the community. Despite numerous appeals and "Vinanti" made by the vendors, Mr. Sharma remained unconcerned.
normalised: According to reports, the conflict revolves around the construction of a commercial complex which threatens the livelihoods of several local vendors, addressed as "Anna" by those in the community. Despite numerous appeals and "Vinanti" made by the vendors, Mister Sharma remained unconcerned.

unnormalised: The matter has caught the attention of political analysts, who wonder if "Kumari" Priyanka, a rising young politician, will take up the cause and challenge the corporator's actions. Many are eagerly waiting to see if "Sardar" Jasbir Singh, known for his strong advocacy, will also step forward to support the protesting vendors.
normalised: The matter has caught the attention of political analysts, who wonder if "Kumari" Priyanka, a rising young politician, will take up the cause and challenge the corporator's actions. Many are eagerly waiting to see if "Sardar" Jasbir Singh, known for his strong advocacy, will also step forward to support the protesting vendors.

unnormalised: The future of the commercial complex and the fate of Mr. Sharma’s political career hang in the balance. As "Sahib" is used as an informal term for respected figures in India, people are now questioning if its apt to address him with the same. The investigation is currently underway.
normalised: The future of the commercial complex and the fate of Mister Sharma’s political career hang in the balance. As "Sahib" is used as an informal term for respected figures in India, people are now questioning if its apt to address him with the same. The investigation is currently underway.
